pullrequest.title: changing multisense_sl camera update rate topic name from /multisense_sl/fps to /multisense_sl/set_fps

content.raw: When I saw the message, I didn't know if the action was really done or if my publication only triggered the deprecation message. Maybe we could improve the message a little bit, something like: "Frame rate was modified but the ros topic ..."
content.html: When I saw the message, I didn't know if the action was really done or if my publication only triggered the deprecation message. Maybe we could improve the message a little bit, something like: "Frame rate was modified but the ros topic ..."
